external-pointer.h

5#ifndef V8_SANDBOX_EXTERNAL_POINTER_H_
6#define V8_SANDBOX_EXTERNAL_POINTER_H_
7
8#include "src/common/globals.h"
9#include "src/sandbox/isolate.h"
10
11namespace v8 {
12namespace internal {
13
14template <ExternalPointerTag tag>
15class ExternalPointerMember {
16 public:
17 ExternalPointerMember() = default;
18
19 void Init(Address host_address, IsolateForSandbox isolate, Address value);
20
21 inline Address load(const IsolateForSandbox isolate) const;
22 inline void store(IsolateForSandbox isolate, Address value);
23
24 inline ExternalPointer_t load_encoded() const;
25 inline void store_encoded(ExternalPointer_t value);
26
27 Address storage_address() { return reinterpret_cast<Address>(storage_); }
28
29 private:
30 alignas(alignof(Tagged_t)) char storage_[sizeof(ExternalPointer_t)];
31};
32
33// Creates and initializes an entry in the external pointer table and writes the
34// handle for that entry to the field.
35template <ExternalPointerTag tag>
36V8_INLINE void InitExternalPointerField(Address host_address,
37 Address field_address,
38 IsolateForSandbox isolate,
39 Address value);
40
41// If the sandbox is enabled: reads the ExternalPointerHandle from the field and
42// loads the corresponding external pointer from the external pointer table. If
43// the sandbox is disabled: load the external pointer from the field.
44//
45// This can be used for both regular and lazily-initialized external pointer
46// fields since lazily-initialized field will initially contain
47// kNullExternalPointerHandle, which is guaranteed to result in kNullAddress
48// being returned from the external pointer table.
49template <ExternalPointerTag tag>
50V8_INLINE Address ReadExternalPointerField(Address field_address,
51 IsolateForSandbox isolate);
52
53// If the sandbox is enabled: reads the ExternalPointerHandle from the field and
54// stores the external pointer to the corresponding entry in the external
55// pointer table. If the sandbox is disabled: stores the external pointer to the
56// field.
57template <ExternalPointerTag tag>
58V8_INLINE void WriteExternalPointerField(Address field_address,
59 IsolateForSandbox isolate,
60 Address value);
61
62// Set up a lazily-initialized external pointer field. If the sandbox is
63// enabled, this will set the field to the kNullExternalPointerHandle. It will
64// *not* allocate an entry in the external pointer table. That will only happen
65// on the first call to WriteLazilyInitializedExternalPointerField. If the
66// sandbox is disabled, this is equivalent to InitExternalPointerField with a
67// nullptr value.
68V8_INLINE void SetupLazilyInitializedExternalPointerField(
69 Address field_address);
70
71// Writes and possibly initializes a lazily-initialized external pointer field.
72// When the sandbox is enabled, a lazily initialized external pointer field
73// initially contains the kNullExternalPointerHandle and will only be properly
74// initialized (i.e. allocate an entry in the external pointer table) once a
75// value is written into it for the first time.
76// If the sandbox is disabled, this is equivalent to WriteExternalPointerField.
77template <ExternalPointerTag tag>
78V8_INLINE void WriteLazilyInitializedExternalPointerField(
79 Address host_address, Address field_address, IsolateForSandbox isolate,
80 Address value);
81
82} // namespace internal
83} // namespace v8
84
85#endif // V8_SANDBOX_EXTERNAL_POINTER_H_
